extension.disclaimer: You must be within Australia to use watch these videos.

extension.description: Watch latest episodes, sneak peeks, exclusive internet extras and other videos from Network Ten.
extension.disclaimer: You must be within Australia to use watch these videos.[CR]The TENplay, TEN, ONE and ELEVEN logo and trade marks are registered trademarks of Network Ten Pty Limited.

extension.description: iView offers full-length programs as seen on ABC TV, and iView originals ranging from arts to anime. Programs are added every day; most programs are available for 14 days. You must be located in Australia to access content. NOTE: This will count towards your Internet usage quota.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description: Watch the latest AFL replays, news and match reports. Live streaming available with a valid AFL Live Pass
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not affiliated with the AFL in any way.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description: Netball Live allows you to use you Free Telstra Live Pass to stream live matches, match replays, and other videos offered by this service. Note: this add-on is not compatible with passes obtained via in-app purchase.

extension.summary: Github issue reporting for Aussie Addons
extension.description: Github issue reporting for Aussie Addons

extension.summary: Custom Requests Session for Aussie Addons
extension.description: Custom Requests Session for Aussie Addons

pycaption is a caption reading/writing module. Use one of the given Readers to read content into a CaptionSet object, and then use one of the Writers to output the CaptionSet into captions of your desired format.

Download and install add-ons from the CatchupTV AU repository.[CR][CR]By using this repository you will be able to download and use the latest version of the Catch-UP TV plugins and other Australian based content.

extension.summary: SBS On Demand by Aussie Add-ons
extension.description: SBS On Demand provides free, unlimited streaming of TV shows, films and events. Watch full episodes of your favourite SBS shows online when you want.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
[B]Version v1.1.3[/B] - Fix missing quote in travis yaml (#1267) - Adapt error handling to new utils module (#1263)
[B]Version v1.1.2[/B] - Fixes unbound local errors - Revise subtitle metadata logic - Handle no subtitles available, remove subtitle setting - Fix subtitles - Add user reporting, code updates - Metadata and common module update fixes - Fix missing requirement - Code cleanups, use common modules and update metadata - Update README.markdown
[B]Version v1.1.0[/B] - Properly fix SSL issues with Python 2.7.9+
[B]Version v1.0.9[/B] - Ignore SSL errors on Python 2.7.9+ - Add handling for absence of subtitle metadata - Added files via upload - Update comm.py - Enable subtitles in settings - Add support for subtitles - Change method of playing videos
[B]Version v1.0.8[/B] - Fix XBMC v12 thumbnail handling error
[B]Version v1.0.7[/B] - Fix for handling duration with decimal point
[B]Version v1.0.6[/B] - Support fetching new streaming tokens
[B]Version v1.0.5[/B] - Update basic auth string
[B]Version v1.0.4[/B] - Better program sorting (Thanks Peter Beckwith!) - Handle bad season/episode number information - Fix strptime lock issue
[B]Version v1.0.3[/B] - Update HTTP Basic auth password - Fix Github API url for issue reporting - Reduce debug logging - Only retry 3 times, not 10
[B]Version v1.0.2[/B] - Better edge case program handling and program information - Fix 'Coming Soon' category (Thanks Peter Beckwith!)
[B]Version v1.0.1[/B] - Cache all the URLs fetched - Sort programs alphabetically - Don't filter out some programs - Update Github issue API
[B]Version v1.0.0[/B] - Initial version

addon.name: DRM Helper

extension.summary: Module to assist in aquiring components to enable DRM playback
extension.description: This module is required for add-ons which can play back Widevine DRM protected videos. It will fetch and install the required content decrypter module and single sample decrypter module from our repo, and attempt to install the required inputstream.adaptive add-on.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
[B]Version v1.0.7[/B] - Update travis.yml - Fix for IndexError exceptions
[B]Version v1.0.6[/B] - Fix android x86 - Remove Kodi commit tag checking - Fix Android import error
[B]Version v1.0.3[/B] - Formatting and docstrings - Several changes/features - Escape paths, fix buildversion errors - Fix Android error, begin Leia support - missing version attribute - Support Android, other tweaks/fixes - Windows - fix implementation and detect 32bit or 64bit - Fix error in addon.xml
[B]Version v1.0.2[/B] - Update broken inputstream.adaptive zip links - update icon
[B]Version v1.0.1[/B] - Feature to get i.a from direct link and install. - Catch error when trying to install modules without i.a - Add error message for Kodi < 17.0 - Add config - Improvement in checking for inputstream.adaptive
[B]Version v1.0.0[/B] - Initial version

addon.news:
[B]Version v1.0.1-2-g6822d91[/B] - Update broken inputstream.adaptive zip links - update icon
[B]Version v1.0.1[/B] - Feature to get i.a from direct link and install. - Catch error when trying to install modules without i.a - Add error message for Kodi < 17.0 - Add config - Improvement in checking for inputstream.adaptive
[B]Version v1.0.0[/B] - Initial version

extension.description: PLUS7 offers video streaming of full length episodes as seen on Seven, 7TWO and other content partners - just hit the play button and you can watch high quality, full screen videos straightaway without having to wait for downloads.
extension.news:
[B]Version v3.3.1[/B] - Update .travis.yml
[B]Version v3.3.0[/B] - Update .travis.yml - Remove mention of Australia in error message - Use current mobile API (#1909) - Several updates (#1908) - Use external pycaptions, enable captions by default
[B]Version v3.2.0[/B] - Prevent reports for program fetch errors (esp outside Australia) - Update provider name in addon.xml - Updates for common module, flake8 fixes, issue reporting updates - Update Travis CI token - Update metadata - Use aussie add-ons common module - Update README - Update utils for flake8 compatibility, remove version file - Add new higher resolution icon - Add Travis CI config - Use external drmhelper and issuereporter, flake8, live fix - Update README.markdown - Fix subtitles not working - Use MP4 streams for non DRM protected content - Update README.markdown - Fix undefined variable - Remove unneeded log - Set default postcode - Android api unreliable with urllib2. - Place live tv above genres - Add sorting by genre, add live streams - Allow for missing cdm folder - small fixes - Add support to download Widevine modules - Add DASH DRM support
[B]Version v3.1.1[/B] - Disable compatibility mode streaming method completely
[B]Version v3.1.0[/B] - Switch to native streaming by default - Fix addon logging - Don't allow SystemExit and other user errors for issue reporting - Fix NoneType errors for empty episode listings - Fix compatibility streaming mode under Windows
[B]Version v3.0.0[/B] - Fix handling of missing metadata - Filter out TV Snax programs - Fix typo for exception handling in issue log reporter - Change method of playing videos
[B]Version v2.8[/B] - Handle unicode chars in logging
[B]Version v2.7[/B] - Better fault handling and log reports
[B]Version v2.6[/B] - Better handling of missing data and fix for XBMC v12 program list
[B]Version v2.5[/B] - Initial version

extension.description: NRL Live allows subscribers of Telstra's NRL Digital Pass to stream live matches, match replays, and many other videos offered by this service.
extension.news:
[B]Version v1.2.1[/B] - quick fix for mktime overflow error - Update provider name in addon.xml
[B]Version v1.2.0[/B] - update travis token - Major overhaul - Small fix - Better handling for no eligible services
[B]Version v1.1.8[/B] - Fix several errors
[B]Version v1.1.7[/B] - Use new requests functions/cleanup/fix DST error - additional exception handling and logging - flake8 compliance
[B]Version v1.1.6[/B] - Fix incorrectly named variable - Update README.md
[B]Version v1.1.5[/B] - Replace HDS with HLS streams, use cache add-on - Enhanced exception handling and logging
[B]Version v1.1.4[/B] - Ooyala cleanup, cache user token - Reinstate forced TLSv1 - Properly handle dummy list items - Correct times for DST, fix for old quality settings
[B]Version v1.1.3[/B] - Disable ordered headers
[B]Version v1.1.2[/B] - Set default streaming method - Small tidy-up, better formatting of live matches - Fix parsing of live matches
[B]Version v1.1.1[/B] - Fix error in utils, ascii encode game time - Update README.md
[B]Version v1.1.0[/B] - update addon.xml - Overhaul of code - Use bs4 for html parsing - Update for 2017 - Fix 2016 season - Update README.md - update ooyalahelper
[B]Version v1.0.0[/B] - Initial version

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
[B]Version v1.0.2[/B] - Rework .travis.yml
[B]Version v1.0.1[/B] - Deal with import _strptime python bug, update travis.yml - Show detected country to user on error - Use ipinfo for connection details and only allow AU reports - Fix for showing error dialog for non-reportable errors - Fix traceback handling in error reports - Fix error message handling - Fix token handling - Another attempt at token - Hopefully last time - .. and again - Update reporting token again after it went missing - Filter out any non-str values in exc value args - Update github token again - Rework version number handling and other fixes - Refactoring - Update exception handling - Include issue reporter and utils enhancements - Fix requirements and flake8 updates
[B]Version v1.0.0[/B] - Initial version
